metadata.title: Autochart Bathymetric/Seismic Map Production (PMEL Vents)

creators.name: Atmospheric Research (OAR), Pacific Marine Environmental Laboratory (PMEL), Vents Program

metadata.description: Autochart is a GMT-based custom bathymetric map generator from Vents Programs' Northeast Pacific multibeam data base, satellite-derived bathymetry or DBDB5 data. Earthquake source locations from NOAA's hydroacoustic monitoring project can also be superimposed on the maps (Autoseismic).
metadata.notes:
Purpose: To monitor the global ocean through underwater acoustics.

Status: In Progress

Maintenance frequency: Unknown

Access constraints: None

Use constraints: None
